detectors.description:
Crowdsale.constructor(uint256,uint256,uint256,address) (repairResNew/scscN/Hodbo_crowdsaleU1.sol#128-137) contains a tautology or contradiction:

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens(address) (repairResNew/scscN/Hodbo_crowdsaleU1.sol#144-154):

	- TokenPurchase(msg.sender,beneficiary,weiAmount,tokens) (repairResNew/scscN/Hodbo_crowdsaleU1.sol#152)
